title: FS: T206 EPDG George Stovall Batting SGC 50
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: T206 EPDG George Stovall Batting SGC 50
posts.post_content:
These are too nice for me... looking for a new home.  Prices include delivery, standard paypal preferred:

Harry Steinfeldt (Portrait) - SGC 40 - SOLD
Population reports show only 8 graded

Dots Miller - SGC 55 - SOLD
Population reports show 16 graded with only 3 higher

George Stovall (Batting) - SGC 50 - $275
Population reports show only 6 graded with only 1 higher
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/raw/7541/stovall-george-batting[/IMG][IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/raw/7540/stovall-george-batting[/IMG]
Chris, that's a beautiful Dots Miller.  Would you please crack it out and take a nice scan for me?  I'd like to use that card image on my website.
Will look for an auction house if I can't sell here...
